name: Meowoof（OWO）
description:
Meowoof is a quirky 2D action game. Player must control a cat and a dog at the same time, and defeat enemies while spinning and finding their owner!

Added #RushMode, a fast-paced endless stage that has a shorter duration and more room for tricks! Come give it a try!

Game Features:.
Innovative "action" game with just one button!
A most peculiar pair!
A unique adventure to find their owner!
Keep spinning to stay alive!
Easy? Challenging? You decide!

More Infomation:.
